评论详情: It looks great on

I absolutely adore this sweater it's cozy and stylish! The color block design is modern and fun, and I love how it adds a pop of personality without being too flashy. The 3/4 length sleeves give it a unique, relaxed vibe, and the oversized, baggy fit makes it super comfy to wear all day long. It’s incredibly versatile and goes perfectly with jeans, leggings, or skirts. If you're looking for a comfy, chic sweater that’s both cozy and stylish, this is definitely the one to grab! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Beware -- very see-through due to loose weave.
评论详情: Pretty, but unexpectedly very loose weave. It's very see-through and will absolutely require a camisole underneath. The fit and color is nice.
Absolutely adorable!!!
Not too thick, good fit
These are very pretty but if you plan to layer, be sure to go up a size.  I wear a 2X and the XXL was not loose enough for me.
So Cute !  Fit was true to size love the pops of color.  A nice lightweight sweater.
Fabric is amazing and the fit is right on. I really wanted to like this sweater, and I do.
Great quality. Love the look

I have to admit, I bought this with the idea of wearing as a 70s costume, but I actually like the way it looks period!  I ended up going with more of a disco look and returned most of the “hippie” looks.  But I am keeping this!!  I love it!  I am 5’5” and about 150lbs.  I got a large, although I considered exchanging it for a medium.  I haven’t washed it yet, so I will keep the large as I like things loose.  I imagine it may stink if I put it in the dryer, which would be OK.  I saw reviews saying it was too short, but I didn’t don’t that to be the case, unless it shrinks a ton after 1st laundry.  It is casual and fun.
I have worn it twice and get tons of compliments. Fits great, hangs well, great find for the price!

This is one of my favorite fall purchases. The sweater pairs well with jeans or leggings. It is not too hot like other sweaters can be. Great for packing because it doe not wrinkle. The material is textured but that doesn’t bother me.  The small is true to size. It says hand wash only but I put in washer on gentle cold cycle and then hang up to dry. Seems fine to me.
Great looking sweater and very flattering on~ love the colors!

评论概述: A little thin; a little shapeless
评论详情: This 'sweater' is very thin, and it is see through. Do not count on this to keep you warm if your wearing in a cool office/school/ etc. That said, it's easy to pair with jeans or even khakis/slacks and nice to wear in a mild climate/ with something more than a cami or tank top underneath.
The fabric was not as anticipated, fit was uncomfortable.

评论概述: Baggier and more sheer than expected.

This is my favorite COLOR  and style.
I have had such luck with Dokotoo and this sweater is no exception. Lightweight (I put a cami underneath) and great quality. Fits true to size!
The quality is fab, very classy, vibrant colors. Dress casual or add accessories and it’s dressy!! Must have top!! Very flattering.

Great lightweight fun sweater. True to size and soft material.
Fit perfectly for a L petite! The fabric is an open weave and hope it doesn’t stretch out of shape!
I love this soft, colorful, bohemian style sweater. I could wear it over a T-shirt or alone. The fit is perfect and a sweater is fun.
The sweater would be great but the neck is very small making it difficult to over your head. There is no stretch or give in the neckline. Material is nice and once on fits okay.

Like the style and very comfortable, non-cling fit.  Could wear with or without a camisole underneath...best with a nude- or light grey-colored bra if no camisole.  Careful around objects that could pull on the knit, but a lovely top.  Strongly recommend gentle hand washing in a garment bag and laying flat to dry in order to preserve the knit and shape.
Super cute and comfy. Good quality. Lightweight.
Love the lightweight feel of the sweater. Fits great and covers the unforgiving tummy area. I got a large and it fits perfectly for me. I am 5’5” 165 lbs.
Fits as expected, and so very cute. Don't expect it to keep you warm if it's windy, though!
It’s light and pleasant on the skin, washed 3 times ( by hand- dried flat) and it has kept its shape. Colors didn’t fade but it plushes a bit Sleeves are a bit large.

i ordered the beige. cozy, comfy, fits true to size but oversized which i like.
